definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: curse (perh. akin to I. [[נקב]] perh. secondary format. fr. [[קָבַב]], q. v. for forms [[יִקּׂב]],[[קׂב ]], etc.); —

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. sf. [[נׇקְבוֹ שֵׁם]] Le 24:16; Pt. ´[[נׁקֵב שֵׁם י]] v:Le 24:16 (on text v. Di, Gei:Urschrift 274 Dalman:Adonal 44 f.).
